entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 40 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Friday 7 April 2023
